hero.title: Plan Your Perfect Journey, Your Way
hero.subtitle: Meet Travel-Rizz - your friendly AI travel planner. No signup required. Have a natural conversation about your travel dreams, and we'll help you turn them into reality - one thoughtful detail at a time.

about.title: About Travel-Rizz
about.intro: Travel-Rizz began with a simple truth: everyone deserves to experience the joy of a well-planned journey, regardless of their planning expertise. Through years of helping friends and family plan their trips, I saw how overwhelming the process could be.
about.experience: That's why I created Travel-Rizz - to empower travelers with the right tools and AI technology. Whether you're exploring bustling cities or seeking quiet adventures, having an intelligent travel assistant in your planning journey makes all the difference.
about.mission: By combining personal travel insights with advanced AI, we aim to make trip planning feel like having a conversation with a knowledgeable friend who's genuinely excited to help shape your perfect journey - all without requiring accounts or signups.

features.title: How We Help You Plan Better

aiChat.title: AI-Powered Travel Planning
aiChat.description: Chat instantly with our AI travel assistant - no account needed. Share your ideas as you would with a friend, and our intelligent system will understand your preferences to create personalized plans.

insights.title: Timely Travel Knowledge
insights.description: Access helpful insights about your destination - from weather patterns to local customs - exactly when you need them, all powered by our AI that learns what matters to you.

routes.title: Visual Routes Drawing
routes.description: See your daily adventures laid out on interactive maps. Our AI optimizes your routes based on your preferences, helping you make the most of each day.

itinerary.title: Flexible Day Itinerary
itinerary.description: Build your days with intuitive tools and AI assistance that organizes activities your way. Start planning in seconds with no registration required.

pricing.title: Simple, Clear Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Focus on what matters - planning your perfect trip - with straightforward pricing that respects your journey. No account creation, no hidden fees.

footer.tagline: Plan Your Perfect Journey, Your Way
